document.full_text: a federal jury convicted three colombian men of drug trafficking and money laundering as affiliates of the revolutionary armed forces, or farc, a paramilitary group that controls south american cocaine trade.
document.title: colombian farc narco-terrorists convicted in seattle
lines_and_colors: a federal jury convicted three colombian men of drug trafficking and money laundering as affiliates of the revolutionary armed forces, or farc, a paramilitary group that controls south american cocaine trade.
